text.name: guidanceSteering_warning_dropDistance
text.text: Drive at least 15m in order to set point B. Current traveled distance: %.2f

text.name: guidanceSteering_warning_setWidth
text.text: Please set a working width first!

text.name: guidanceSteering_warning_createTrackFirst
text.text: Please create or load a track first!

text.name: guidanceSteering_tooltip_showLines
text.text: 显示引导线以帮助您进行视觉定位 Support your visuals by showing the guidance lines

text.name: guidanceSteering_tooltip_terrainAngleSnap
text.text: Snap the direction to the terrain angle

text.name: guidanceSteering_tooltip_enableGuidanceSteering
text.text: 让GPS自动控制驾驶方向 Let the GPS guide the steering

text.name: guidanceSteering_tooltip_autoInvertOffset
text.text: 在车辆掉头时自动翻转非对称工具(例如犁)的偏移量 Automatically invert the offset on a turn

text.name: guidanceSteering_tooltip_width
text.text: 设置当前车辆工具的工作宽度 Set the width of your vehicle

text.name: guidanceSteering_tooltip_offsetWidth
text.text: 设置当前车辆工具的偏移量 Set the offset of your vehicle

text.name: guidanceSteering_tooltip_widthInCrement
text.text: 设置工具宽度的单次改变量 Set the width increment to increase/decrease the width

text.name: guidanceSteering_tooltip_offsetIncrement
text.text: 设置工具偏移量的单次改变量 Set the offset increment to increase/decrease the offset

text.name: guidanceSteering_tooltip_strategy
text.text: 此选项决定使用哪个策略创建引导路径 Determine which strategy to use to create the guidance lines

text.name: guidanceSteering_tooltip_strategyMethod
text.text: 此选项决定哪个策略方法将被使用 Determine which strategy method to use

text.name: guidanceSteering_tooltip_currentTrack
text.text: Select the current track to use

text.name: guidanceSteering_setting_scopeTrackFarmId
text.text: 保存当前路径 Save track to farm

text.name: guidanceSteering_tooltip_scopeTrackFarmId
text.text: 将当前的路径设定保存到您的农场，在多人模式下默认每个人都可以读取 Save the track scoped to the farm of the vehicle, by default it's accessible for everyone

text.name: guidanceSteering_tooltip_offsetLines
text.text: Offset the line for more ground clearance.

text.name: guidanceSteering_tooltip_trackAlreadyExists
text.text: 路径名称'%s'已存在! Track name '%s' already exists!

text.name: guidanceSteering_tooltip_trackIsNotCreated
text.text: 保存路径数据失败，请先创建或读取一条路径! Failed to save track data, please create or load a track first!

text.name: guidanceSteering_setting_headlandMode
text.text: 地头控制行为 Headland mode

text.name: guidanceSteering_tooltip_headlandMode
text.text: 在地头控制行为中您可以设定车辆到达田地边缘时的行为 With the headland mode you can set the acting strategy on the headland.

text.name: guidanceSteering_setting_headlandDistance
text.text: 地头控制提前激活距离 Headland act distance

text.name: guidanceSteering_tooltip_headlandDistance
text.text: 设定在实际到达地头前提前激活地头控制行为的距离(米) Distance in meters to act before approaching the headland.

text.name: guidanceSteering_tooltip_showLinesAsDots
text.text: Render the lines with dots, when turned off normal lines are displayed.

text.name: guidanceSteering_headland_mode_2
text.text: 向左转入下条路线 Turn left

text.name: guidanceSteering_headland_mode_3
text.text: 向右转入下条路线 Turn right
